title: ISic000503. I.Sicily inscription 000503
body:
1L(ucius) · Pinarius · Rufus · ob · honorem
2aedilitatis · imaginem · gen[ii]
3municipi · Lilybitanor(um) · ex arg(ento) p(ondo) V p(ecunia) s(ua) p(osuit)

1LPINARIUSRUFUSOBHONOREM
2AEDILITATISIMAGINEMGEN[..]
3MUNICIPILILYBITANOREXARGPVPSP

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text from CIL;
  • line.3: Gualtherus: LILYBITANOR. ; Mommsen et al.: Lilybitanorum;
  • Gualtherus: ARGR. VP S P

English translation

James Hua

Lucius Pinarius Rufus, on the occasion of his office of aedile, set up this 'image' of the Genius of the municipality of the Lilybaeans from money of a weight of five units, taken from his own funds

commentary

bibliography

  • 10.7223 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
  • 6768 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000352
  • Manganaro 1988 44 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001427
